content: i wanted to knit a makeup bag that didnt include any complicated techniques and really couldnt find anything that s why i came up with this and made 8 different sizes __________________________ in this pattern there are 3 sizes for the everyday makeup bag 2 sizes for the makeup brush pouch and 3 sizes for a to-go pouch ______________ makeup bag sizes width x height 21x16 24x19 30x22 cm brush purse 9 5x19 12x21 cm to-go pouch 7x10 9x14 13 5x9 5 cm ____________________ gauge 20 stitches x 28 row = 10cm x 10cm on 4mm in stockinette stich it s knit in either 2 strands filcolana saga and 1 strand filcolana alva or 1 strand filcolana saga and 1 strand filcolana arwetta or 2 strands filcolana arwetta or whatever matches the gauge techniques used to make the bag long tail cast-on stockinette stitch in the round three needle bind-off links long tail cast on https //www youtube com/watch v=sxa3gbnisim three needle bind off https //www youtube com/watch v=ph93jwszta0 how to start with magic loop https //www youtube com/watch v=pifc_i7zgdw magic loop https //www youtube com/watch v=1mqiqrdjc68 sewing the lining and zipper https //youtu be/xfml0_yckhu si=kus__xxqf-ptdwvc
